reviews.review: I love how even after the game is almost out of date, they do a huge update on it. Not just any update, one i can play forever!

Masterpiece! 10/10

Uma sequência digna de seu título anterior, inovador e com mecânicas refinadas. Atinge perfeição em aspectos como: Personagens, Jogabilidade e História.
Apesar da campanha ser um pouco curta, o modo coop, Steam Workshop e a facilidade na criação de mapas garantem mais horas e horas de diversão.

I consider this the Platinum Standard for excellent storytelling, ambience, characters, dialogue, gameplay, soundtrack, world building, voice-overs...I could go on for hours.

Bottom line: I have never played a game this good before or since Portal 2, and frankly, I doubt I ever will.

amazing!

I recently bought the PC version of Portal 2 (having played it on XBox 360) and I had forgotten just how much I loved it when it was first released. No surprise, this is the best looking version you can own, the game will still capture all of your attention, the puzzles are expertly crafted, and the addition of the Perpetual Testing Initiative only adds more replay value. Portal 2 is a testament to Valve's ability to craft a story, world, and characters that few developers/studios can match.

Use your Brain bro

Novamente, mais uma obra prima da Valve. Contém uma história cativante, puzzles que vão te levar à loucura, para depois descobrir que a solução tava na cara, um gameplay de mais de 5 horas dependendo do seu desempenho, multiplayer para você dividir sua frustação com outro amigo, tudo isso por um mero preço de menos de 10 reais na maioria das sales. Na minha opnião, traz um ótimo desfecho à série, mas isso não me impede de querer um Portal 3.

传送门系列在3D冒险解谜类游戏中是历久弥新的经典。

如果说2007年面世的初代还略显苍白青涩，
4年后的续作（本游戏）就显得精致丰满了许多。

时常可见的绿植，和实验室的自我修复行为让场景变得颇有生趣，
而操作手感上也比初代更加顺畅平滑，大概是引擎升级、帧数提高的关系？
（当然，晕3D的朋友还是会发现并没有什么起色）
剧情上只需要知道主角干掉了初代BOSS就可以啦，反正很快又会见面了~
强烈推荐！
休闲、解谜类玩家一定不会失望。

———————————>>[i]  Enjoy It ![i] <<———————————

最后想吐槽一下DOTA2的传送门大礼包好贵呀！比两代游戏本体贵了6倍！

Portal 2, compared to the first game, is longer and more linear, the focus this time being the story and characters. Because it's longer the tests had to be shortened a bit and because of that it may feel like they're easier than the ones in Portal 1. But don't worry, if you feel unsatisfied and want more action there is co-op mode to ease your hunger for testing and the community maps that are available from the start(they also come with a level editor so you can make your own levels if you want).
Como se os puzzles não fossem o bastante, a forma como o jogo conduz a narrativa é sensacional. Um jogo excelente.

Almost literal outside the box thinking required, only "almost" because you're still inside the "box" just on the other side of it without ever crossing the room. You learn to think with portals, and start wishing you had one, or two (as in get both this and the first one!)
This is hands down the greatest product of all time.

Portal 2 es un muy bueno juego.
Este juego es un rompecabezas, pero divertido, ya que siempre tienes compañia, con Glados (que ya estaba presente en portal 1) o con Wheatley. 
Es un juego muy completo,  ya que posee cámaras online de modo solo y de modo cooperativo, en el cual tú y un amigo tienen que resolver una misma cámara.
El clima del juego es genial, ya que tiene seriedad por la dificultad de resolver cámaras, pero los comentarios de Glados o Wheatley, te dejan riendo en muchas ocasiones. 
Cual sería la razón por la que vale la pena comprar portal 2 y no portal 1? Básicamente por su historia, que es más larga,su modo cooperativo,  y su multiplayer que esta lleno de cámaras. Todo esto dará horas y horas de diversión. 

En fin, solo hice este analisis para ganarme una recompensa en steam. GG!
Jogue o COOP com algum amigo, garanto que vão se divertir, jogo sensacional, recomendo !!!!
Un gioco di logica che vi farà scervellare, una trama avvincente con una vena di comicità ...ingredienti perfetti per un gioco incredibile! Consigliato!

Portal 2 Увлекательная головоломка в которую вы можете играть как один (Одиночная), Так же и с друзьями на специальных тестовых камерах, Помимо этого всего в Portal 2 присутствует приятное музыкальное сопровождение и замечательная игровая физика
Ofrece puzzles geniales, buen humor, grandes personajes (Incluso si solo son dos) y un final perfecto. Tu mejor decisión sería comprarlo

Si sos del tipo de jugador que solo juega FPS y queres probar algo nuevo, este es tu juego. El modo historia offline es muy divertido, continua la historia unos años despues de los acontecimientos ocurridos en Portal. Nuesto objetivo vuelve a ser el de escapar de las instalaciones de Aperture Science con vida con ayuda de la vieja y confiable pistola de portales, al paso que vamos resolviendo distintas camaras de pruebas. El modo single player es muy completo y divertido, sobre todo por los comentarios sarcasticos de GlaDos, que si bien la vamos a odiar en algunas ocaciones, la vamos a terminar queriendo un poco.
Ademas del modo singleplayer posee un modo cooperativo, que continúa la historia de Portal 2, en el cual nuestro objetivo es, junto con otro jugador, rescatar a los humanos que se encuentran en estado de criogenizacion dentro de los laboratorios. Nuevamente estaremos a las ordenes de GlaDos, quien intentará hacer que peleemos entre los jugadores mientras resolvemos los distintos puzzles.
Estos dos modos de juego parecen algo cortos, aunque no lo son, ya que una camara de pruebas puede costarte mucho tiempo hasta que te des cuenta de lo que tenes que hacer.
Si con esto no te convenzo de este juegazo, ademas de los modos que mensione anteriormente, podemos jugar a camaras de prueba hechas por miembros de la comunidad, ya sea en modo single player o cooperativo. Tambien podemos crear nuestras propias pruebas, jugarlas y subirlas a la comunidad.
Altamente recomendable y adictivo, dudo que si lo compras te vayas a arrepentir

Я много раз проходил мимо этой игры прежде чем поиграть в нее. Но, когда начал играть, влюбился в нее. Это действительно стоящее вашего времени творение. Действующих лиц в игре немного, но все они просто потрясающие. Головоломки достойные, некоторые из них заставляют изрядно попотеть. Если вы еще не играли в Portal 2, то не тяните и начните прямо сейчас.
P. S. Portal я также рекомендую для вхождения в сюжетную линию. Но, сам я начал именно со второй части.

This game holds a special place in my heart because it was the main reason I got steam. I watched my brother play this and portal 1 on his computer, and had asked for him to get it for me. 3 years later, 142 hours well spent in both games and many more on different amazing games that I sure won't forget. I can thank Portal 1 and 2 for getting me into PC gaming more than I was at the time. I would recommend buying this and Portal 1, as they are great puzzle games with intriguing stories and replay ability like no other.

Эта игра - веха в истории. Отличный сюжет, графика, некривой код, куча лулзов и грамотное новаторство. Я внес Portal 2 в список игр, которые порекомендую собственному ребенку )))

Portal 2 takes what was great about the original Portal - the puzzles and humor - and elevates it to the next level.

The puzzles are even more devious, the humor that much more amusing and in-depth compared to the original. In particular, listening to Cave Johnson's messages (brought to life so well by actor J.K. Simmons) throughout the game is a delight.

Portal 2 is absolutely a worthy sequel, and another instant classic.

I can't express how much I love this game. It was a game that made me sad to leave it's world every time i had to go away from my computer. The campaign was very well made and made me feel immersed in it's world. It was a pretty lengthy one too, considering it took me about 8 hours to complete. The co-op is  one of the best things to happen to this series even if i only played for an hour and a half. All things considered, this is easily one of the best games i've ever played. When will Portal 3 come out?
